response.answer_text: A wire associated with a single phase(R/Y/B) is called a phase wire. A phase wire carries current only meant for that phase. In star connection line current equals phase http://current.In delta connection line current equals √3 times phase current.

The Hot wire or phase wire is basically a phase conductor which is connected to supply mains... The materials used for phase wire is invariably. ASCR (Aluminium conductor steel rein forced) or could be straight or stranded copper or aluminium conductor. Number 1 Energy Supplier In Australia | Energy Power Systems
